name: The Definitive Edition (But Better) Engine
description:
-INFORMATION-

"The Definitive Edition (But Better) Engine (2022)" is an engine that was established in 2021 by Millicent & Davion Bandicoot. This is for the purpose of if you want to create your own game with this engine (only on Scratch of course).

-CONTROLS-

Title Screen - Press Space on either menu option.

Main Game - Right or left arrows to move either direction, Z key to jump, Z + X keys to perform a spindash (Hyper only).

Gamepad controllers are acceptable as well.
